channel.title: [PI] Reflux 317 || ECO Based Server
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/uLyOUDE.png[/img][/center]
Hey, not many have ever heard of me apart from the people that have played my servers over the past year or so, but this is the one server i actually stuck to and started to get somewhere. I started with the Plain Aggroth server and client and started to make my changes and then met Damo ( Damoiscool on Mopar) and we got together on the server and relized we could get somewhere with the server with the abilities he had in Java which were higher than mine. He began with the fixing packets and deadlocks that had been left throughout the server and such and i began to 'beautify' the server with the updated shops, training areas, home, fixed GFX's and such. we had a pretty good community to help us with all the bugs and all, But we just never got to finishing the project as we had things in our lives to do, traveling and working. Overall it was fun doing and i will admitt it's not IKOV or SOULSPLIT so it's not the best or anything!
[b]Features[/b] Single NPC's Have double shops Shops.CFG Cleaned Home at edgeville PVP Items such as Vesta, Statius, Morrigans etc. Spirit Shields Custom Colored Whips with working anims and specials Korasi's Sword with working special attack Working ring of wealth. Auto-Join Clan Chat on login Custom Barrows System Most dupes fixed, most bugs squashed Working Overloads Pk Point Shops Added most NPC spawns to the base Good Starter Items Working mystery boxes Extra Raredrop table NEX Auto Cache Downloader Custom Quest Tab Auto-Voting and Vote Points Good XP rates Decent drop rates Ability to bank all items Working Minigames Working Bosses Working Turmoil Double xp weekends New Training Zone NPC Kills Table Added Teletabs Time Online Option Shops items to ECO Not pvp QUEST- Dragon Slayer Added 99 Achievement reward React Trivia New teleports ready to go GTLVOTE ready to go vote4cash
[b]Media[/b] Going to try and add as much info as i can into the images, they may be ulter'd over time.
[b]Same Old Home[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0wZ334w.png[/img]
[b]Fighting Shops[/b] [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2z7iiwg.jpg[/img]
[b]Other Shops[/b] [img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/rszzft.jpg[/img]
[b]Teleports[/b] [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2eehqg5.jpg[/img]
[b]Interface[/b] [img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/vsfl2p.jpg[/img]
[b]Npc Kills and Npc Points[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8vpNFEH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Oiri6SK.png[/img]
[b]Ring Of Wealth[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/itUyNBV.png[/img]
[b]Sinister Key to Instantly reach the barrows brothers[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qOzmOGf.png[/img]
[b]Dragon Slayer, Must talk to 4 npc's throughout reflux then fight elvarg[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/an7213D.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jsn6dvP.png[/img]
DOWNLOADS Server + Client https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/74959440/Reflux%20Server/Reflux%20Server.zip Cache https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/74959440/Reflux%20Server/RefluxCache.zip
Credits Jax - Jaximus Damoiscool for helping Coldmedicine for aggroth insanity for original and to whoever did whatever whenever.
Tell me what you guys think and what should be fixed and such if i was to make a V2

item.dc:creator: @godswords godswords

item.title: [PI] Reflux 317 || ECO Based Server
item.dc:creator: @jaximus jaximus
item.description:
@jaximus wrote:

[center][/center]

Hey, not many have ever heard of me apart from the people that have played my servers over the past year or so, but this is the one server i actually stuck to and started to get somewhere. I started with the Plain Aggroth server and client and started to make my changes and then met Damo ( Damoiscool on Mopar) and we got together on the server and relized we could get somewhere with the server with the abilities he had in Java which were higher than mine. He began with the fixing packets and deadlocks that had been left throughout the server and such and i began to ‘beautify’ the server with the updated shops, training areas, home, fixed GFX’s and such. we had a pretty good community to help us with all the bugs and all, But we just never got to finishing the project as we had things in our lives to do, traveling and working. Overall it was fun doing and i will admitt it’s not IKOV or SOULSPLIT so it’s not the best or anything!

Features
Single NPC’s Have double shops
Shops.CFG Cleaned
Home at edgeville
PVP Items such as Vesta, Statius, Morrigans etc.
Spirit Shields
Custom Colored Whips with working anims and specials
Korasi’s Sword with working special attack
Working ring of wealth.
Auto-Join Clan Chat on login
Custom Barrows System
Most dupes fixed, most bugs squashed
Working Overloads
Pk Point Shops
Added most NPC spawns to the base
Good Starter Items
Working mystery boxes
Extra Raredrop table
NEX
Auto Cache Downloader
Custom Quest Tab
Auto-Voting and Vote Points
Good XP rates
Decent drop rates
Ability to bank all items
Working Minigames
Working Bosses
Working Turmoil
Double xp weekends
New Training Zone
NPC Kills Table
Added Teletabs
Time Online Option
Shops items to ECO Not pvp
QUEST- Dragon Slayer
Added 99 Achievement reward
React Trivia
New teleports
ready to go GTLVOTE
ready to go vote4cash

Media
Going to try and add as much info as i can into the images, they may be ulter’d over time.

Same Old Home

Fighting Shops

Other Shops

Teleports

Interface

Npc Kills and Npc Points

Ring Of Wealth

Sinister Key to Instantly reach the barrows brothers

Dragon Slayer, Must talk
to 4 npc’s throughout reflux then fight elvarg

DOWNLOADS
Server + Client https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/74959440/Reflux%20Server/Reflux%20Server.zip
Cache https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/74959440/Reflux%20Server/RefluxCache.zip

Credits
Jax - Jaximus
Damoiscool for helping
Coldmedicine for aggroth
insanity for original
and to whoever did whatever whenever.

Tell me what you guys think and what should be fixed and such if i was to make a V2
